name: Roll Back
description:
Made for - Brackey's Game Jam 2020.2

1.0 is here! This is a balanced, functional build for WGL and PC (And OSX as soon as Cloud Build finishes that)

INSTRUCTIONS:

Finish the area, score points, and beat your high score!

Left and Right (A/D or Controller) to move the ball left or right (applying force)

S or back apply braking force (note that if you are going quite fast you might not really feel the brakes...).

Hold Jump (Space on the keyboard) to use the rewind mechanic.

You have a limited rewind energy that regenerates over time

You score points and increase your multiplier by passing through rings and finishing fast

Rewind can no longer be used to auto-brake as it now preserves Velocity (this is more fun in my opinion... And faster and harder!).

You SHOULD rewind to: 

- Save your skin (falling off the track will result in a Game Over)

- Get more points (Think adding multipliers from multiple "tracks").

Have fun and please leave some feedback! :)

Unity 2020 (<3) - So much more than just a game engine

Amplify Shader Editor - Great for making custom shaders and easy to use!

Gimp - Free and Easy image editor

ProBuilder - Fully integrated in Unity and great basic 3D modelling.
